author: bayard
msg: Added a link to CODEC-57 in the javadoc

author: bayard
msg: Applying Benjamin Bentmann's patch from CODEC-65, which changes the various encoders to use a locale when lowercasing. The encoders all assume the English locale, so when running in non English locales the default toLowerCase sometimes does not work as the encoder expects.

author: bayard
msg: Modifying the unit test for CODEC-57 to test for empty string, and added a note to the Metaphone javadoc that it does not match the PHP or Perl variants
